siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
Minecraft 1.17 The Caves & Cliffs Update Playlist ► https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7VmhWGNRxKixIX8tWEQn-BnYKE9AaAXk
Minecraft 1.17 snapshot 21w07a brings about new ore generation and a new block... grimstone! It comes in tiles, polished and brick varieties.

Minecraft 1.17 Snapshot 21w06a New Cave Generation & World Height Increased!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgVWM54A6bM&list=PL7VmhWGNRxKixIX8tWEQn-BnYKE9AaAXk

https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-21w07a

Featured Tweet!
https://twitter.com/henrikkniberg/status/1362095363314876418

localize.title: Minecraft 1.17 Snapshot 21w07a Grimstone & New Ore Generation.
localize.description:
Minecraft 1.17 The Caves & Cliffs Update Playlist ► https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7VmhWGNRxKixIX8tWEQn-BnYKE9AaAXk
Minecraft 1.17 快照 21w07a 带来了新的矿石生成和新的块... Grimstone! 它有瓷砖、抛光和砖的品种。

Minecraft 1.17快照21w06a新洞穴生成及世界高度增加!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgVWM54A6bM&list=PL7VmhWGNRxKixIX8tWEQn-BnYKE9AaAXk

localize.title: 任天堂直接 - 2.17.2021

next.excerpt:
Presented by Heineken

A bittersweet win for Porto after a game that they largely controlled, having chances to score a third before conceding a late goal from Chiesa. The hosts' gameplan went as planned, preventing Juventus from creating danger for most of the game.

Stream every UEFA Champions League match live on CBS All Access:
http://bit.ly/ucloncbssports

#UCL #Porto #Juventus
next.title: FC Porto vs. Juventus: Extended Highlights | UCL on CBS Sports

localize.title: 波爾圖 vs. 尤文圖斯: 延伸的精華片段｜UCL on CBS Sports
localize.description:
由喜力公司出品

波尔图在这场比赛中取得了苦乐参半的胜利，他们基本上控制了比赛，有机会取得第三名，但最后却丢掉了基耶萨的进球。主队的比赛计划如期进行，在比赛的大部分时间里都没有让尤文图斯制造危险。

在CBS All Access上直播每场欧冠比赛。
http://bit.ly/ucloncbssports

#UCL#波尔图#尤文图斯

localize.title: 波爾圖 vs. 尤文圖斯: 延伸的精華片段｜UCL on CBS Sports
localize.description:
由喜力公司出品

波爾圖在這場比賽中取得了苦樂參半的勝利，他們基本上控制了比賽，有機會取得第三名，但最後卻丟掉了基耶薩的進球。主隊的比賽計劃如期進行，在比賽的大部分時間裏都沒有讓尤文圖斯製造危險。

在CBS All Access上直播每場歐冠比賽。
http://bit.ly/ucloncbssports

#UCL#波爾圖#尤文圖斯
